column1: Family will receive friends from 10:30-11:00 a.m. Monday
column3: 2015 at Immanuel Lutheran Church in Carrollton. Funeral Services will be held at 11:00 a.m. on Monday
column5: 2015 at Immanuel Lutheran Church in Carrollton with Pastor Eric Swyers officiating. Interment will follow in Oak Hill Cemetery in Carrollton.
